Articles.Content:
This is Kally's ship at the SPH

![4SoMFVm.png](http://i.imgur.com/4SoMFVm.png)

This is Kally's ship at the VAB.

**Crawled Away**

![Bnnq9UT.png](http://i.imgur.com/Bnnq9UT.png)

**Can you find it?**

**Post your Where's Kally's Ship images.** 

**Be creative and obscure Kally's Ship anywhere.**

**Use anything to obscu**re.

Here are some more Where's Kally's Ship

**Clothes Hanger**

![fuQoXD3.png](http://i.imgur.com/fuQoXD3.png)

**White Hats**

![DpAb30q.png](http://i.imgur.com/DpAb30q.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-13T22:09:35Z" title="07/13/2015 10:09  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 13, 2015</time> by MoeslyArmlis**
Those are clever spots... I can't give them away.
This is very similar to the "I Spy with my Kerbal Eye" thread.

> 
> This is very similar to the "[I Spy with my Kerbal Eye](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/119720-I-Spy-With-My-Kerbal-Eye?highlight=Spy+Kerbal+Eye)" thread.

Yes they are similar, but this has the constant of Kally's Ship. And just like that silly Wally, Kally's Ship can be hidden amongst other objects around the kerbol system.

I am devising a hiding spot and will post soon. I hope it will be more challenging and might need to zoom the image to find it.

Let me know if the resolution is too low (it is maxed at 1920x1080) and I will upload a super screen shot if I can remember how to change the config settings.

Sit Down and Relax

![dOhXz0u.png](http://i.imgur.com/dOhXz0u.png)

Deduction is the way to solve this.

> 
>  This is not the same image and was trying the super sample settings and this is at 2 times
> 
> ![t3bCmef.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/t3bCmef.jpg)
> 
> I would like to have more clutter laying about the image. I think this resolution is about right when using zoom and not too easy to spot.
> 
> 

Thanks to everyone who do not spoil the location of Kally's Ship.

Post found Kally and the image title. 

Post if you are stumped too.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-13T22:03:27Z" title="07/13/2015 10:03  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 13, 2015</time> by MoeslyArmlis**

Oh god. Okay, this might be a really mean spot.

*Commander's plot*

![U8i7TdB.png](http://i.imgur.com/U8i7TdB.png)

To anyone that does find it, was that mean?

Found Kally's Ship in Commander's Plot

This had me getting close to my monitor.
